title: York County Builds Home for Injured Veteran
summary: York County residents unite to build a mortgage-free, accessible home for Army Sgt. Nicholas Firth through Homes For Our Troops.
charlotte_impact: Highlights community support for veterans and provides a tangible benefit to a local hero.

title: Cooler Sunday with Spotty Rain in Charlotte
summary: Scattered rain expected across the Charlotte area on Sunday with highs in the upper 40s to near 50 degrees.
charlotte_impact: Provides a brief weather update relevant to local residents' weekend plans.

title: Duke Energy Customers Won't Get Refund for Illegal Charges
summary: NC court rules Duke Energy customers won't receive refunds for improperly collected charges.
charlotte_impact: Impacts consumer finances and raises questions about utility accountability.

title: Charlotte Police Seek Parents of Found Child
summary: Police are asking for the public's help in locating the guardians of a young boy found alone in north Charlotte on Saturday.
charlotte_impact: Raises concerns about child safety and community responsibility.

title: Rock Hill Mourns Children Killed in Shootings
summary: Community leaders seek solutions after recent shootings in Rock Hill claimed the lives of young people, including a 4-year-old.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the tragic impact of violence on youth and the need for conflict resolution.

title: Salisbury Police Search for Suspects in Fatal Motorcycle Collision
summary: A motorcycle collision in Salisbury resulted in one death and two injuries; police are searching for the suspects.
charlotte_impact: Addresses road safety and the consequences of reckless driving.

title: Ballantyne Office Site Could Become Housing
summary: Office spaces in Charlotte's Ballantyne area may be converted into multifamily and townhouse units.
charlotte_impact: Reflects changing urban development trends and potential housing solutions.

title: Stabbing in West Charlotte Injures One
summary: A stabbing on Reid Avenue in west Charlotte left one person with non-life-threatening injuries on Saturday morning.
charlotte_impact: Reports on local crime and its impact on community safety.

title: Sex Offender Charged with Grooming Chesterfield Child
summary: Oregon man charged after allegedly grooming a Chesterfield County child on Discord using Roblox gift cards.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the dangers of online child exploitation and the importance of parental vigilance.

title: Charlotte Woman Arrested for $7.7K Lululemon Theft
summary: A Charlotte woman with a criminal history faces felony charges after a Lululemon theft incident.

title: Teens Charged in Rock Hill Parking Deck Shooting
summary: Two juveniles face charges after an 18-year-old was fatally shot during a failed robbery attempt.

title: Missing Eden Woman Found Alive After 24 Years
summary: Barbara Byrd learns her cousin Michele, missing since 2001, is alive but wishes for privacy, offering relief after 24 years.
charlotte_impact: Offers a rare positive outcome in a long-standing missing person case.

title: Gastonia Police Raise Thousands for Special Olympics
summary: Gastonia Police and SWAT raised $4,705 for Special Olympics, winning first place for fundraising.

title: Police Respond to Separate Shootings in Salisbury
summary: Police responded to two separate shootings in Salisbury, both resulting in serious injuries to the victims.

title: Concerns Rise Over I-77S Toll Lane Project
summary: The proposed I-77 toll lane expansion raises tensions over its impact on west Charlotte's historically Black neighborhoods.
